content.text:
Let me analyze the images and provide the solution:

Main Target Image Analysis:
- The structure consists of 4 blocks in 3 layers
- Bottom layer: Green vertical block
- Middle layer: Yellow horizontal block across the green block
- Top layer: Red block with an arch, positioned on top of the yellow block

Block Dictionary Selection:
- Green vertical block: Block 3 or 5 (I'll choose Block 3)
- Yellow horizontal block: Block 7
- Red block with arch: Block 1

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 3 (green vertical block)
    Step2: Move block with index 7 (yellow horizontal block) on top of the green block
    Step3: Move block with index 1 (red arch block) on top of the yellow block
}

The assembly follows the visual structure shown in the main target image, using the exact blocks from the dictionary without any rotation, matching the colors, shapes, and orientations precisely.
